sentences: Jennifer Majura Indrasen (born 16 June 1983) is a German guitarist, bassist and singer.
She had since played in Knorkator (guitarist, 2012â€“2014), Equilibrium (bass, 2014) and Evanescence (guitarist, 2015-present).
On 7 August 2015, Evanescence frontwoman Amy Lee announced that Majura would replace lead guitarist Terry Balsamo in the band.
